title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Enterprise, Trade and Employment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Enterprise, Trade and Employment 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited enterprise trade employment (delegation ministerial functions) order 2021

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment conferred on him by or under 
the Protection of Employees (Employers’ Insolvency) Acts 1984 to 2020 are 
delegated to Damien English, Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, 
Trade and Employment. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

19 January, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [71] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
